cu.explanation_en: Setting GNB_IPV4_ADDRESS_FOR_NG_AMF to an invalid IP format (999.999.999.999) will cause AMF connection failure and network unavailability.

du.explanation_en: Setting nrofUplinkSlots to an out-of-range value (100) will cause invalid TDD configuration and uplink transmission failure.
du.explanation_zh: 將 nrofUplinkSlots 設定為超出範圍的值 (100)，會導致無效的 TDD 配置，並造成上行傳輸失敗。
